posting_body: 2 Bedroom Apartment In Great Location, Close to Everything In Westwood.

Close To Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
2 bedroom apartment offers the following features:
This 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment features central air/heat, a cozy fireplace, extra storage space.
Full kitchen with quartz countertops, appliances including a microwave, a dishwasher, a gas stove/oven and a refrigerator.
Community features include covered parking, a fitness center, a laundry facility, and a swimming pool.
Located in great Westwood location, close to everything!
We're minutes away to all popular Westside destinations including Armand Hammer Museum of Art & Cultural Center, UCLA, Getty Museum, Geffen Playhouse, Wadsworth Theatre.
Fabulous restaurants and shopping, movie theatres, world class yoga, and public transportation are all at your fingertips.
Apply now for this coming school year!
